mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name, phone, role FROM users
SELECT user_id, email, password, first_name, last_name, phone, role, disabled FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (password, email, first_name, last_name, phone, role) VALUES (#{password}, #{email}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phone}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE users SET disabled = false WHERE email = #{userEmail}
